meta.title: Coronavirus Updates - Port Chester Public Schools

body.script:
var siteAlerts = [{"id":3827,"title":"Schools to remain closed through May 15, 2020","body":"
Due to the COVID-19 coronavirus crisis, Governor Cuomo has decided to continue to keep schools closed through May 15. Please review important details on the school website as updates occur regularly.","dateStart":"2020-03-13T21:09:21Z","baseGroupName":"PORT CHESTER PUBLIC SCHOOLS","hash":"xCwV+l2edCBv34YrTFtxQCRzAaG3pbVSVGhOHrcMfYc=","updateDate":"2020-04-16T22:18:16Z"}];
